titles.title: Medicare Respiratory Therapy Initiative Act of 2009
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for Medicare coverage services of qualified respiratory therapists performed under the general supervision of a physician.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/29/2009--Introduced. Medicare Respiratory Therapy Initiative Act of 2009 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover the services of a qualified respiratory therapist performed under the general supervision of a physician.
